# Python 数据结构与算法

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/python-shujujiegou-yu-suanfa
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/python-shujujiegou-yu-suanfa
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install python-shujujiegou-yu-suanfa
python-shujujiegou-yu-suanfa <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g python-shujujiegou-yu-suanfa
python-shujujiegou-yu-suanfa <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
